trans-unit.source: Provides data for the `AudioSignalProblemOccurred` event of a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> or a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 데이터를 제공는 `AudioSignalProblemOccurred` 의 이벤트는 <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> 또는 <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: An instance of AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs is created when the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> object raises an `AudioSignalProblemOccurred` event.
trans-unit.target: AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs의 인스턴스를 만들 때의 <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>또는 <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>발생 시키는 개체는 `AudioSignalProblemOccurred` 이벤트.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: To obtain information related to an `AudioSignalProblemOccurred` event, access the following properties in the handler for the event: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs.AudioLevel%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs.AudioPosition%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs.AudioSignalProblem%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A> The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs.AudioPosition%2A> property references the input device's position in its generated audio stream.
trans-unit.target: 와 관련 된 정보를 얻으려면는 `AudioSignalProblemOccurred` 이벤트를 이벤트 처리기에서 다음 속성에 액세스:- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs.AudioLevel%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs.AudioPosition%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs.AudioSignalProblem%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A>는 <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs.AudioPosition%2A>속성 참조의 생성 된 오디오 스트림 내의 위치를 입력된 장치.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs.AudioPosition%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs.AudioSignalProblem%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs.AudioPosition%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs.AudioLevel%2A>

trans-unit.source: By contrast, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A> property references the recognizer's position within its audio input.
trans-unit.target: 반면,는 <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A>속성 오디오 입력 내의 인식기에서 위치를 참조 합니다.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: These positions can be different.
trans-unit.target: 이 위치는 다를 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Speech Recognition Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01c598ca-2e0e-4e89-b303-cd1cef9e8482).
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 참조 [음성 인식 이벤트를 사용 하 여](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01c598ca-2e0e-4e89-b303-cd1cef9e8482)합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs.AudioSignalProblem%2A> property indicates which problem occurred.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs.AudioSignalProblem%2A>속성 어떤 문제가 발생을 나타냅니다.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs.AudioSignalProblem%2A>

trans-unit.source: AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs derives from <xref:System.EventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs <xref:System.EventArgs>.</xref:System.EventArgs> 에서 파생 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the audio level associated with the event.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트와 관련 된 오디오 수준을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The level of audio input when the `AudioSignalProblemOccurred` event was raised.
trans-unit.target: 오디오 수준을 입력 될 때는 `AudioSignalProblemOccurred` 이벤트가 발생 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the position in the input device's audio stream that indicates where the problem occurred.
trans-unit.target: 문제가 발생 한 위치를 나타내는 오디오 스트림 입력된 장치에서에서 위치를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The AudioPosition property references the input device's position in its generated audio stream.
trans-unit.target: AudioPosition 속성에는 입력된 장치 위치에 생성 된 오디오 스트림 참조합니다.

trans-unit.source: By contrast, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A> property references the recognizer's position within its audio input.
trans-unit.target: 반면,는 <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A>속성 오디오 입력 내의 인식기에서 위치를 참조 합니다.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: These positions can be different.
trans-unit.target: 이 위치는 다를 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Speech Recognition Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01c598ca-2e0e-4e89-b303-cd1cef9e8482).
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 참조 [음성 인식 이벤트를 사용 하 여](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01c598ca-2e0e-4e89-b303-cd1cef9e8482)합니다.

trans-unit.source: The position in the input device's audio stream when the `AudioSignalProblemOccurred` event was raised.
trans-unit.target: 오디오 입력된 장치에서 위치를 스트리밍할 때는 `AudioSignalProblemOccurred` 이벤트가 발생 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the audio signal problem.
trans-unit.target: 오디오 신호 문제를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The audio signal problem that caused the `AudioSignalProblemOccurred` event to be raised.
trans-unit.target: 원인이 되는 오디오 신호 문제는 `AudioSignalProblemOccurred` 이벤트를 발생 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the position in the audio input that the recognizer has received that indicates where the problem occurred.
trans-unit.target: 오디오 입력에서 인식기에서 받은 문제가 발생 한 위치를 나타내는 위치를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs.AudioPosition%2A> property references the input device's position in its generated audio stream.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs.AudioPosition%2A>속성 참조의 생성 된 오디오 스트림 내의 위치를 입력된 장치.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs.AudioPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: By contrast, the RecognizerAudioPosition property references the recognizer's position within its audio input.
trans-unit.target: 이와 반대로 RecognizerAudioPosition 속성 오디오 입력 내의 인식기에서 위치를 참조합니다.

trans-unit.source: These positions can be different.
trans-unit.target: 이 위치는 다를 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Speech Recognition Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01c598ca-2e0e-4e89-b303-cd1cef9e8482).
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 참조 [음성 인식 이벤트를 사용 하 여](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01c598ca-2e0e-4e89-b303-cd1cef9e8482)합니다.

trans-unit.source: The position in the audio input that the recognizer has received when the `AudioSignalProblemOccurred` event was raised.
trans-unit.target: 오디오 입력에서 인식기가 받았는지 경우 위치는 `AudioSignalProblemOccurred` 이벤트가 발생 합니다.
